Package imagingbook.common.ransac

Class RandomDraw<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.ransac.RandomDraw<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - element type
    public class RandomDraw<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Randomly draws a set of k unique, non-null elements from a given array with elements of type T, which may contain null elements. The size of the draw (k) is fixed and must be specified at construction. The resulting sets contain no duplicate elements.
